description:
Convenient 1 bedroom apartment off Franklin Avenue - in the heart of Crown Heights. Exposed brick and beautiful red wood floors throughout. Light fills the bedroom, bathroom and dining room.

Close to stunning Botanical Gardens and Brooklyn museum. 5-10 minute walk to many subway lines - very easy to get into Manhattan or around Brooklyn. Caribbean, Italian, Mexican restaurants, great coffee, and cosy bars and nightclubs.
name: Charming light-filled apartment in Crown Heights
review: Location in an up and coming area which is great. The apartment matches the pictures well. All in all a good stay which I can recommend.
